genresAdvancedInfo.name: anthem
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Anthem is a genre of music that is characterized by its uplifting and inspiring lyrics, often with a strong sense of patriotism or social justice. The music is typically anthemic, with big choruses and soaring melodies that encourage audience participation. It is often associated with stadium rock and is popular at sporting events and political rallies. Examples of anthem artists include Bruce Springsteen, U2, and Queen.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
